record.properties: Top = 155 Left = 502 Width = 765 Height = 493 DataSource = .NULL. Name = "Dataenvironment"
Top = 20 Left = 10 Height = 292 Width = 114 Alias = "mr_instances" Order = "iname" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_instances" Name = "Cursor1"
Top = 20 Left = 150 Height = 279 Width = 241 Alias = "mr_enum_gameversion" Order = "gverlong" OrderDirection = 2 Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_enum_gameversion" Name = "Cursor2"
Top = 20 Left = 459 Height = 363 Width = 182 Alias = "mr_mods" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_mods" Name = "Cursor3"
Top = 0 Left = 0 DoCreate = .T. Caption = "INSTANCES" uniqueid = 601C1595B05F46FDA00D1C22A3788D5B Name = "MR_INSTANCES" tmrSql.Name = "tmrSql"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Destroy *!* destroy
_inisetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', mr_instances.iguid) ENDPROC PROCEDURE init2 *!* init2
If Seek(_inigetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', mr_instances.iguid), 'MR_INSTANCES', 'IGUID') = .F.
Go Top In 'MR_INSTANCES'
Endif ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_deleteinstance *!* mr_deleteinstance
local omod
if not empty(mr_instances.iguid)
select 'mr_mods'
scatter blank name m.omod
m.omod.iguid = '00000000' m.omod.fguid = '00000000' m.omod.rguid = '0000000000000000'
scan for mr_mods.iguid = mr_instances.iguid
gather name m.omod
endscan
select 'mr_instances'
delete next 1 in 'mr_instances'
thisform.refresh()
endif ENDPROC

record.properties: FontName = "Consolas" FontSize = 8 Anchor = 14 Height = 144 Left = 12 ReadOnly = .T. TabIndex = 9 Top = 348 Width = 552 ZOrderSet = 0 Value = IntegralHeight = .F. islog = .T. Name = "edtlog"
Anchor = 15 Height = 300 Left = 12 Top = 36 Width = 936 _gridcontextmenulang = en Name = "gridmain"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE AfterRowColChange LPARAMETERS nColIndex
thisform.Refresh() ENDPROC PROCEDURE DblClick _inisetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', mr_instances.iguid)
Do Form MR_MODS ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 12 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_add_black_18dp.png Caption = "ADD" ToolTipText = "ADD INSTANCES" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "_tbcommand6"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click mr_instancegetfolder()
If Seek(_inigetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', mr_instances.iguid), 'MR_INSTANCES', 'IGUID') = .F.
Go Top In 'MR_INSTANCES'
Endif
Thisform.gridmain.Refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 744 Height = 28 Width = 60 Caption = "CF ZIP" ToolTipText = "GENERATES THE CF MODPACK ZIP" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 tbalign = 2 Name = "_tbcommand16"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click mr_instanceadd(mr_instances.ifolder)
mr_gencfmodpackzip(mr_instances.iguid)
thisform.refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 72 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_clear_black_18dp.png Caption = "DELETE" ToolTipText = "DELETE SELECTED INSTANCE" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "_tbcommand1"
record.methods: PROCEDURE Click thisform.mr_deleteinstance() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 588 Height = 28 Width = 48 Caption = "SERVER" ToolTipText = "GENERATE SERVER FOLDER - WILL DELETE CURRENT SERVER MODS FOLDER" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 tbalign = 2 Name = "tbserver"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click local onlycfmods
m.onlycfmods = .f.
mr_instanceadd(mr_instances.ifolder)
mr_genserverfolder(mr_instances.iguid, m.onlycfmods)
thisform.refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 252 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_folder_black_18dp.png Caption = "SF" ToolTipText = "SELECT A TARGET SERVER FOLDER TO CREATE A SERVER" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbfolder"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local isrvfolder, lastfolder
If Empty(mr_instances.isrvfolder)
m.lastfolder = mr_instances.ifolder
Else
m.lastfolder = mr_instances.isrvfolder
Endif
m.isrvfolder = Getdir(m.lastfolder, 'Select target server folder for this instance', '', 1 + 64 + 16 + 32)
If Not Empty(m.isrvfolder) Then
Replace mr_instances.isrvfolder With m.isrvfolder In 'mr_instances'
Endif
Thisform.Refresh()
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 492 Height = 28 Width = 48 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_web_asset_black_18dp.png Caption = "MODS" ToolTipText = "OPEN THE INSTANCE MODS TAB" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 tbalign = 2 Name = "_tbcommand2"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click _inisetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', mr_instances.iguid)

record.methods:

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 312 Height = 28 Width = 48 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_folder_black_18dp.png Caption = "ZF" ToolTipText = "SELECT A TARGET FOLDER FOR ZIP FILES" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "_tbcommand7"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local izipfolder, lastfolder

Endif

ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 864 Height = 28 Width = 48 Caption = "SERVER ZIP" ToolTipText = "GENERATE SERVER ZIP" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 tbalign = 2 Name = "_tbcommand8"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click local onlycfmods
mr_instanceadd(mr_instances.ifolder)
m.onlycfmods = .t.
mr_genserverfolder(mr_instances.iguid, m.onlycfmods, addbs(thisform.apppath) + 'temp_server')
mr_genserverzip(mr_instances.iguid, addbs(thisform.apppath) + 'temp_server')
thisform.refresh()
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 360 Height = 28 Width = 48 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_folder_black_18dp.png Caption = "TF" ToolTipText = "SELECT A TARGET TWITCH INSTANCE FOLDER" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "_tbcommand12"
record.methods:

record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click if not empty(mr_instances.isrvfolder)
if _FILE(addbs(mr_instances.isrvfolder) + 'start.cmd')
?mr_createprocess(addbs(mr_instances.isrvfolder) + 'start.cmd', '')
endif
endif
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 132 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_bottom_black_18dp.png Caption = "MINVER" ToolTipText = "SETS THE MIN MINECRAFT VERSION OF THE INSTANCE WHEN SEARCHING FOR MODS" Name = "_tbcommand3"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local nselect, result
m.nselect = Select()
Select 'mr_enum_gameversion'
*!* Lparameters pItemID, pParentId, pItemType, pItemChecked, pItemDisabled, pItemCaption, pItemPicture
Go Top
Scan
This.tbmenuitemadd(Recno('mr_enum_gameversion'), 0, 0, 0, 0, mr_enum_gameversion.gver)
Endscan
_restorearea(m.nselect)
m.result = This.tbmenushow()
If m.result > 0 Then
Go m.result In 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Replace mr_instances.gver1 With mr_enum_gameversion.gver Replace mr_instances.gverlong1 With mr_enum_gameversion.gverlong
Endif
Thisform.Refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 192 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_top_black_18dp.png Caption = "MAXVER" ToolTipText = "SETS THE MAX MINECRAFT VERSION OF THE INSTANCE WHEN SEARCHING FOR MODS" Name = "_tbcommand4"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local nselect, result
m.nselect = Select()
Select 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Scan
This.tbmenuitemadd(Recno('mr_enum_gameversion'), 0, 0, 0, 0, Alltrim(mr_enum_gameversion.gver))
Endscan
_restorearea(m.nselect)
m.result = This.tbmenushow()
If m.result > 0 Then
Go m.result In 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Replace mr_instances.gver2 With mr_enum_gameversion.gver Replace mr_instances.gverlong2 With mr_enum_gameversion.gverlong
Endif
Thisform.Refresh() ENDPROC
